hero.excerpt: Launch your digital business with AI-assisted market research and instant landing page generation.
hero.subtitle: A comprehensive platform that guides users from market discovery to high-fidelity landing page deployment in minutes.

author.name: Apex Neural Team
author.bio: Building the next generation of AI-native development tools.

overview.text: DBaaS (Digital Business as a Service) is a platform that provides access to sophisticated market research and web development. By combining Reddit signal mining, AI-driven pain point analysis, and generative UI, it allows entrepreneurs to validate ideas and launch professional landing pages without writing a single line of code.

architecture.description: The platform is built on a modern stack featuring a React 18 + Vite frontend and a microservices backend. Key architectural highlights include global state management via Zustand, resilient API handling with extensive fallback strategies, and a containerized deployment pipeline using Docker.

components.name: Frontend Core
components.desc: React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui for a responsive, accessible interface.

components.name: AI Services
components.desc: Dedicated services for market analysis, Reddit scraping, and landing page synthesis.

components.name: State Management
components.desc: Zustand stores and React Query for seamless server-state synchronization.

components.name: Infrastructure
components.desc: Dockerized containers orchestrated for scalability and rapid deployment.

proTip.title: Graceful Degradation
proTip.text: The frontend implements a sophisticated mock-fallback system. If backend services (like AI analysis) are temporarily unavailable, the UI seamlessly switches to high-fidelity mock data, ensuring the user journey is never interrupted.

workflow.description: The user journey is designed as a guided funnel. It begins with broad topic discovery, narrows down to specific market signals, validates opportunities through AI analysis, and culminates in the automated generation of a conversion-optimized landing page.
workflow.caption: From Concept to Conversion: The DBaaS User Flow
